com.android.slackandhay.gameobject
Class GOGameObject

java.lang.Object
  com.android.slackandhay.gameobject.GOGameObject
Direct Known Subclasses:
GOGameObjectFactory.GOCamera, GOGameObjectFactory.GODecoration, GOGameObjectFactory.GOEnemyDog, GOGameObjectFactory.GOEnemySoldier, GOGameObjectFactory.GONonGridMember, GOGameObjectFactory.GOPlayer
public abstract class GOGameObject
extends java.lang.Object

This class represents the most fundamental object we created to represent objects inside the game, they can be extended with components

Author:
Tilman BÃ¶rner, Jan Rabe & Tom Wallroth

getComponent

public GOComponent getComponent(GOComponentType type)

addComponent

public GOComponent addComponent(GOComponent component)
Adds a GOComponent to this gameObject. If a component of the same ComponentType is already present, it will be replaced.

Parameters:
component - the component to be added. null will effect no changes; to remove a component, use removeComponent(com.android.slackandhay.gameobject.component.GOComponentType).
Returns:
the replaced component; null means no replacement took place.

removeComponent

public GOComponent removeComponent(GOComponentType type)
Removes the component of the given type from this gameObject. Since the gameObject can have at most one component of any type, there is no ambiguity in which component to remove. If this gameObject has no such component, nothing will be removed.

Parameters:
type - The ComponentType type of the componnent to remove. null will effect no changes.
Returns:
The GOComponent that was removed. null means nothing was removed.
